description: The Berchtesgaden area starts a two-week lockdown, Germany's first since the spring Covid peak.
title: Coronavirus: German Alpine region goes into lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: German Alpine region goes into lockdown - BBC News
maintext: In Ireland, restrictions similar to the spring lockdown will come into effect from midnight on Wednesday. People are being asked to stay at home and will only be able to exercise within 5km (3 miles) of their home. Schools will stay open and the restrictions will last six weeks.
